articles.title: ISI-BUDS
articles.description: Irvine Summer Institute in Biostatistics and Undergraduate Data Science
articles.contents:
PHOTO
ISI-BUDS is a six-week summer program in biostatistics and biomedical data science.
More info about the program content. More info about financial support.
Check requirements to see if you qualify for the program. If you do, you may submit your application. We strongly encourage applications from â€¦..
Important Dates
Applications open - March 15
Applications due - May 1
Results announced - May 15
ISI-BUDS dates - July 11 - Aug 18

articles.title: Requirements
articles.contents:
Applicants must
Be an undergraduate student at the time of the institute.
Be US citizen or permanent resident
Have knowledge of and interest in computing, probability, calculus, and linear algebra. These prerequisites are flexible.
Have interest in scientific questions
GPA???
Requirements for the 2022 program
Participants will be required to follow COVID-19 related regulations of the University of California Irvine, including proof of vaccination.
Application Form
Applicants will be asked to submit the following along with their application form.
A personal statement of interest
Unofficial college transcripts
A letter of recommendation
